ISN 40 NE RAP 20 ESE AIA 15 SSE SNY 30 N LIC 25 ESE DEN 10 SE DEN 15
NW DEN 25 NW FCL 30 N LAR 45 NNW CPR 55 ESE WRL 35 NNE COD 20 S LVM
25 NNW LVM 30 W LWT 85 ENE HVR.

GEN TSTMS ARE FCST TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 60 N MOT 35 WNW DVL
DVL 35 NW GFK 55 NNW INL ...CONT... 85 NE GNA 40 E GNA 25 WNW MQT 10
E IMT 30 SSW OSH 35 NE MLI 15 N SPI 20 ENE SLO 50 NNE CSV 20 WSW CLT
